file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-43-09-05 - SERVICE DOOR CONNECTION CABLES - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SERVICE DOOR CONNECTION CABLES - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to adjust the cables of the service door mechanisms. B. These procedures are applicable to the two lock boxes and to the internal handle of the service door. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 52-43-09-820-801-A SERVICE DOOR CABLES - ADJUSTMENT EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-43-09 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-43-09-820-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. SERVICE DOOR CABLES - ADJUSTMENT A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to adjust the cables of the lock boxes and the cables of the internal handle of the service door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-43-00/1 AMM TASK 25-23-05-000-801-A/400 SERVICE DOOR LINING PANELS - REMOVAL AMM TASK 25-23-05-400-801-A/400 SERVICE DOOR LINING PANELS - INSTALLATION TASK 52-43-09-600-801-A - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 821 Service door D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY 6,35 mm and 4,75 mm (1/4" and 3/16") Commercially in diameters and 100 mm (4") in length Rigging of the mechanisms available Rig Pins E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MS20995C32 Lockwire AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Service door EMB-145 - AMM 1285 820-801-A/500 52-43-09 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) NOTE: Do not open the door fully. Only put it out of its frame. Open the service door (AMM SDS 52-43-00/1). (2) Remove the service door lining panels (AMM TASK 25-23-05-000-801-A/400). (3) Make sure that all lock boxes, cables, and handles are installed. J. Adjustment (Figure 501) SUBTASK 820-002-A (1) Put the rig pin (17) in the guide cam (18). (2) Put the ring pin (12) in the bellcrank assembly of the mixer (13). CAUTION: FOR DOORS EQUIPPED WITH PROTECTIVE BOOT, BE CAREFUL NOT TO CAUSE DAMAGE TO THE BOOTS WHEN YOU HANDLE THEM. (3) Cut the lockwire (11) and loosen the nut (9) and jam nut (10). (4) Extend the cables (1) of the lock boxes (4). For this, move the cable adjustment terminal (8) until the lock device (3) starts to move. (5) NOTE: Make sure that the red marks (2) of the lock boxes (4) are aligned. Tighten the lock box cable nut (9) and jam nut (10). (6) After the adjustment of the cables, install the lockwire (11) to safety the nuts. NOTE: The two lock box cables can be adjusted at the same time or individually. The same procedure must be done for the two lock box cables. (7) Adjust the internal handle cable (16). For this, cut the lockwire (11), loosen the nut (5) and jam nut (6), and move the cable adjustment terminal (7) until the bellcrank roller (15) touches the internal handle strip (14). (8) Tighten the internal handle cable nut (5) and jam nut (6). (9) After the adjustment of the cables, install the lockwire (11) to safety the nuts. NOTE: All cables must be extended but not tightened. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) For doors equipped with protective boot (19), lubricate the cables of the lock boxes and the cables of the internal handle (TASK 52-43-09-600-801-A). (2) Remove the rig pin (17) from the guide cam (18) and the rig pin (12) from the bellcrank assembly of the mixer (13). (3) Install the service door lining panels (AMM TASK 25-23-05-400-801-A/400). (4) Close the service door (AMM SDS 52-43-00/1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 820-801-A/500 52-43-09 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
